original_text: When a strong man has all the weapons he needs to fight with, he can take care of his own house. Nobody will be able to rob him of the things inside his house.
korean_text: 강한 자가 무장을 하고 자기 집을 지킬 때에는 그 소유가 안전하되

sentences.original_text: When a strong man has all the weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 강한 사람이 모든 무기를 가지고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: he can take care of his own house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 집을 지킬 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Nobody will be able to rob him
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그를 약탈할 수 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: of the things inside his house
